message: Pretty nice this Convore. One feature request I have is the possibility to edit a post you have submitted.
@gustav I think this has potential, but to me there needs to be a time-limit to keep people from being able to go back and change what they said mid-conversation.
It should lock in once there is a reply or comment.
Or you can just delete the original post and submit a new one.

Hmm, you might have a point. I was thinking of the convenience of doing this in Google Wave, but without the GW playback function, it might end up confusing. And I don't think I would like a playback function :)
Could it be achieved by adding a special kind of topic, "bulletin board"? Within this topic type, you are free to edit your posts. Or maybe as @jeffl8n says, I can just delete and resubmit..

sounds like a good idea. i just pondered when i wanted to have this kind of functionality and there is definitely a distinction in the usage of topics: some are more like chat (where editing a post may be confusing), others are more static, like an information list which should be kept at one place...
